In this section we will quickly combine our plots into one image/png file with the [patchwork package](https://neof-workshops.github.io/Tidyverse/ggplot2/patchwork.html).

```{r eval=FALSE}
wunifrac_divergence_plot <- 
    (intra_site_violin_plot | inter_site_violin_plot) /
    (intra_media_violin_plot | inter_media_violin_plot)

#Save ggplot2 object with ggsave
ggsave(filename = "./wunifrac_divergence_violinplots.png",
        plot = wunifrac_divergence_plot,
        device = "png", dpi=300, units = "mm", height = 200, width = 300)
#Display plot
IRdisplay::display_png(file = "./wunifrac_divergence_violinplots.png")
```

For more information on patchwork please see our [Tidyverse guide](https://neof-workshops.github.io/Tidyverse/ggplot2/patchwork.html).
